linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU @ 2.7GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970 / RX 480
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game has been tested to run with harddrive described above. It could run with lighter setups, but you're at your own risk.

  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game has been tested to run with harddrive described above. It could run with lighter setups, but you're at your own risk.
